item.title: 162: Let's Talk About Screen Time [Leadership Now Podcast]
item.description:
In this episode, Dr. Aaron Rock digs into the epidemic of screen time: it's effects on the human psyche, our relationships and our worship. Tune in to hear Aaron's thoughts on how Christians should approach screen time to use it wisely and some pitfalls to avoid.

 

More Resources:

item.author: Dr. Aaron Rock, Chris Eelman
item.itunes:author: Dr. Aaron Rock, Chris Eelman

item.title: 161: Pilgrims, July 4th & Joe Biden [Leadership Now Podcast]
item.description:
This 4th of July, Dr. Aaron Rock takes us through a bit of his family history and explains how is ancestors played a little role in the forming of the United States of America, and the significance of the Fourth of July.  He also shows what modern-day Canadian and Americans have to learn from those great men and women who have gone before us.

 

More Resources:

More resources at Beachhead Media's website: https://beachheadmedia.ca/

Beachhead Media YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCTRwY4I8_rSQ7Z6I05k8lkA
item.author: Dr. Aaron Rock, Eric Oltrop
